headline: Hitler reacts to SOPA
text: "[T]he more freely information flows; the stronger that society becomes." Barack Obama, President of the United States. Since I postponed my morning science video this morning to share my thoughts on SOPA/PIPA, here is the morning video, a little later than usual and with one change: it's not a science video. Instead, it's one of my favourite YouTube meme videos, a video that has been adapted to comment on SOPA/PIPA legislation. It is wonderfully satirical and informative but at the same time, it is probably in some vague and not-yet-determined way in violation of SOPA/PIPA rules, should either of those dumbass bills pass next week:               Visit FightingInternet's YouTube channel [video link].
